name: Gyeongbokgung Palace
description: A grand royal palace of the Joseon dynasty, known for its beautiful architecture and gardens.

name: N Seoul Tower
description: An iconic tower offering panoramic views of Seoul, especially beautiful at night.

name: Bukchon Hanok Village
description: A traditional Korean village with hanok houses, showcasing the architecture of the Joseon dynasty.

name: Jeju Island
description: A popular island destination known for its volcanic landscapes, beautiful beaches, and unique culture.

name: Seoraksan National Park
description: A stunning national park with majestic mountains, clear streams, and diverse flora and fauna.

name: Changdeokgung Palace
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site known for its beautiful garden, Huwon, also known as the Secret Garden.

name: Busan Haeundae Beach
description: A famous beach in Busan, known for its soft sand, vibrant nightlife, and annual festivals.

name: Lotte World
description: A major recreation complex with the world's largest indoor theme park, an outdoor amusement park, and shopping malls.

name: DMZ (Demilitarized Zone)
description: A unique tourist attraction offering a glimpse into the tension between North and South Korea.

name: Hwaseong Fortress
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site known for its impressive walls and structures, reflecting the military architecture of the late Joseon period.

name: Everland
description: A large theme park offering various rides, attractions, and seasonal festivals.

name: Jinhae Cherry Blossom Festival
description: An annual festival famous for its stunning cherry blossoms and picturesque scenery.

name: Bulguksa Temple
description: A historic temple and UNESCO World Heritage site known for its beautiful architecture and serene surroundings.

name: Hahoe Folk Village
description: A traditional village preserving the cultural heritage and lifestyle of the Joseon dynasty.

name: Namdaemun Market
description: A bustling market offering a wide variety of goods, from food to clothing to souvenirs.

name: Cheonggyecheon Stream
description: A scenic urban stream and recreational space in the heart of Seoul.

name: Insa-dong
description: A vibrant neighborhood known for its traditional Korean culture, arts, and crafts.

name: Seoul Forest
description: A large public park offering green spaces, walking trails, and recreational facilities.

name: Gwangalli Beach
description: A popular beach in Busan, known for its beautiful views of the Gwangan Bridge and vibrant nightlife.

name: Dongdaemun Design Plaza
description: A major urban development landmark and cultural hub featuring unique architecture and design exhibitions.
